messages.subject: Alysa in MD, I lost Melanie in NM --HELP!!
messages.msgSnippet: -=-I think you correspond with a woman I know in Maryland, her name is Alysa.  She is a friend of my closest friend out there.  That s where I m from. -=-
messages.messageBody:
-=-I think you correspond with a woman I know in Maryland, her name is
Alysa. She is a friend of my closest friend out there. That's where I'm
from. -=-


Help!
Melanie in Moriarty, New Mexico wrote that. Her address used to be
Lalunamama@aol but that's not working anymore and I want to help hook her up
with some other unschoolers here.

Sorry to ask people all over the world, but that's one of the flukes of
online communications. And with e-mail, it's wholly possible that someone in
New Zealand will know Melanie's e-mail while I, fifty miles away, have no
idea!

If anyone else is or knows New Mexico unschoolers, please ask them to write
to me. We'll have something local going by summer. Maybe by tomorrow. <g>


Thanks.

Sandra

Sandra
